forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a curious blend of clarity and playful winds. The sky arches above, mostly sunny, inviting a gentle warmth near the mid-60s. While temperatures are set to dip slightly as the day progresses, a brisk west wind dances through the streets, whispering tales of the ocean with gusts that flirt with the high 20s. Tonight, the clouds will gather softly, wrapping the city in a muted, serene embrace, with lows around 56, as the west wind continues its evening serenade.

This day holds a mild charm, lacking the fog that often blankets the city. It’s a perfect time to take a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, perhaps threading your way through the piers or savoring a quiet moment in one of the neighborhood parks. For those who take pleasure in the outdoors, a light jacket should suffice against the gentle breeze. As the sun sets, consider settling into a cozy café, perhaps with a view of the evening sky, where you might reflect on the day while the city hums soft melodies of life around you.
